entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries or drizzle late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
